title: Will old skins like mid-evil (;_;) twitch or grey ww ever be sold again?
body: As a twitch main and a collector of the skins of that filthy rat i would love to be able to purchase the infamous skin that shall not be named as it seems to have an amazing splash and i would love to add it not only for the collection but for bragging rights, will it ever be reintroduced?

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have any details on upcoming content.  When [RAF ended](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/upcoming-changes-refer-friend), it was stated that new ways would be looked into towards receiving these skins.  Keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for such a time.  Fingers crossed!
